fields.name: Warning:
fields.value:
Do touch. Will wish you a happy birthday.
Attack: None
Defense: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Create the perfect birthday party for a player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: > The host will give a detailed description about what a birthday party for your target's role would look like.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: > Kill all who oppose the Town. (and also make good birthday parties)
